sourcesContent:
const Contact = () => { return (

Contact us

Call: +1 5589 55488 55
Monday-Friday (9am-5pm)

Email: info@example.com
Web: www.example.com

Location: Aïn Sebaâ Casablanca 20250
Morocoo

Loading
Your message has been sent. Thank you!
); } export default Contact;
